'''''Amir's Raw Meat Commission''''' is a weekly [[Reputation Request]] that occurs in [[Sumeru]].

==Steps==
# Give Amir eight serving of Raw Meat

==Request Details==
Help Needed:<br>
The search and rescue dog squad has been doing quite well so far and deserves an extra meal.<br>
More raw meat should make for a fine reward, I'd say!<br>
Could someone help get me some {{Color|buzzword|Raw Meat}}? Getting them fresh from the hunt would be even better, of course.<br>
{{Color|buzzword|8 chunks}} should be enough.

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Amir from Gandharva Ville needs eight servings of Raw Meat.}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Amir:''' These guys just love running about when they aren't working.
:'''Amir:''' I hope they pay close attention to that girl's condition and report any changes immediately.
:{{DIcon|Quest}} About Raw Meat...
::'''Amir:''' Yeah, I did post a commission on Raw Meat.
::'''Amir:''' Did you get enough? I need eight pieces of them.
::{{DIcon|Quest}} I'm ready.
:::'''Amir:''' The quality is good. The search and rescue dogs won't starve. Thanks.
::{{DIcon}} Not yet.
:::'''Amir:''' Well, it's no small amount, just let me know when you're ready then.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Amir:''' Goodbye. Safe travels.
{{Dialogue End}}
